explains: v. 注意，留意；指出，特别提到；记录（note 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.en: Suddenly, I noted that the rain had stopped.
sentences.cn: 突然，我注意到雨已经停了。

sentences.en: They never noted the building's history of problems.
sentences.cn: 他们从未记录过那座建筑的问题的历史。

sentences.en: They noted the comings and goings of the journalists.
sentences.cn: 他们注意到了记者们的进进出出。
